topics.title: Kazakhstan pilots USD-pegged stablecoin payments for regulatory fees
topics.summary: Crypto exchange Bybit has become the first crypto exchange to debut stablecoin payments for regulatory fees in Kazakhstan’s AIFC.

topics.title: PayPal just enabled crypto for 650M users: Here’s what that actually means
topics.summary: PayPal now supports crypto payments with 100+ coins and PYUSD. Here’s how it works for users and merchants in 2025.

topics.title: Spar rolls out nationwide stablecoin and crypto payments in Switzerland
topics.summary: Spar will launch crypto and stablecoin payments across 300 Swiss supermarkets via Binance Pay and DFX.swiss, marking a retail first for the country.

topics.title: Ripple to buy stablecoin payments platform Rail for $200 million
topics.summary: Ripple has acquired Rail to offer stablecoin payment services, with plans to integrate RLUSD, banking partners and compliance tools across global markets.
